definition: to handle/to manage/to put in order/to arrange/to administer/to execute/to take action on/to plan
to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with

sentences.english: I will make preparations for whatever needed for the opening ceremony for you.
sentences.chinese: 開業典禮所需要的東西，我替你措辦。
